source_sentence: 元魏優禪尼國王子月婆首那譯
translation: Yuan wei, translated by Yue pusunna, prince of the state of Udyāna

source_sentence: 「爾時，仙人告彼人言：『乃往古昔無數阿僧祇劫，時有國王名曰淨月，
translation: “At that time the holy man Śāriputra said to those monks, “Once long ago, when there was a king named Candracchattra (Śubhavyūha) who ruled over innumerable world ages,

source_sentence: 如法治世。
translation: It's like the rule of the Dharma world.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 時淨月王，生一太子。
translation: At the time, King Jōgetsu gave birth to a prince.

source_sentence: 時淨月王，召諸占相婆羅門等，而問之言：「今此童子有何等相？」
translation: The king of the Pure Moon then summoned the diviners, Brahmas, and others, and asked them, What's the characteristic of this boy now?

source_sentence: 爾時，相師白大王言：「今此太子有不祥相，生此太子必有不祥。」
translation: At the time, the soothsayer said to the great king, Now that this prince has an inauspicious appearance, this prince will surely have an inauspicious appearance when he's born.

source_sentence: 大王問言：「汝何所說？」
translation: The great king asked, What did you say?

source_sentence: 相師白言：「如是太子，若至七歲當害父母。」
translation: The fortune teller said, Thus, prince, if you reach seven years old, you'll harm your parents.

source_sentence: 王時答言：「寧當殺我，不殺我子。
translation: The king then replied, You should rather kill me than my child.

source_sentence: 人身難得，於無量劫修行乃得人身，不應以此身而殺人物。」
translation: It's difficult to obtain a human body, and after cultivating it for measureless eons, you'll attain a human body; you shouldn't kill people with this body.

source_sentence: 爾時，太子始生一月如一歲兒，王知太子當殺我身，時淨月王捨位與子，
translation: At that time the prince was just one month old when he was about to be born. When the king knew that the prince would kill me, King Jīvaka renounced his throne and gave birth to my child.

source_sentence: 作如是言：「汝治國事，一切財物自在隨意，如法治世勿為非法。」
translation: He said, You govern state affairs, and all your possessions are free to do as you wish, according to the rules of the world without doing anything unlawful.

source_sentence: 既授位已，時淨月王於其國內，不復行於王之教令。
translation: After he had been given the throne, King Jōgetsu stayed in his country and no longer carried out the king's instructions.

source_sentence: 爾時無量億大臣，至淨月王所，白言：「大王！
translation: It was then that measureless billions of ministers went to King Jīvaka and said, Great king!

source_sentence: 何故不行王之教令？」
translation: Why don't you follow the king's instructions?

source_sentence: 大王答言：「我無量劫常為王事心無厭足，我已厭矣！
translation: The great king answered, For measureless eons, I've always served the king with a mind that doesn't tire of it, and I'm sick of it!

source_sentence: 捨之修行。」
translation: He abandons it and cultivates it.

source_sentence: 爾時，太子未經多時，並殺父母集五逆罪。
translation: It wasn't long before that, the prince killed his parents and compiled five heinous crimes.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 我亦憶念往昔之時，既殺王已愁悲啼泣自責悔過。
translation: I also remember one day in the past when, having killed the king, I grieved and wept with sorrow and repented.

source_sentence: 爾時我以大悲之心為彼說法，彼聞法已逆罪消滅。』
translation: At the time, I taught them the Dharma with great compassion, and after they heard the teaching, their heinous crimes ceased.'

source_sentence: 「問言：『當於爾時說何等法？』
translation: He asked, 'What teaching will be taught at that point?'

source_sentence: 答言：『爾時，演說僧伽吒法門。
translation: He replied, 'At the time, he explained the teaching of the saṃghâṭa dharma-gate.

source_sentence: 若聞此法，當至阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，滅一切罪煩惱休息。
translation: If someone hears this teaching, they'll attain supreme perfect enlightenment and cease all sins and afflictions.

source_sentence: 汝今諦聽，當為汝說。
translation: Listen attentively and I will explain it to you.

source_sentence: 令汝聞已速得解脫。
translation: I will cause you to quickly attain liberation after hearing it.

source_sentence: 聞四句偈令不中闕，盡一切惡得須陀洹。
translation: He hears a four-line verse that causes it not to be missing, ending all badness and attaining stream entry.

source_sentence: 然後布施遠離諸苦，受苦眾生令得解脫，怖畏眾生令得遠離。』
translation: After that, he gives alms to be freed from suffering, causes suffering sentient beings to attain liberation, and causes fearful sentient beings to be freed.'

source_sentence: 爾時彼人合掌頂禮，讚言：『善哉，善哉！
translation: It was then that the man joined his palms and bowed his head in praise, saying, 'Good, good!'

source_sentence: 真善知識！
translation: Indeed, good friend!

source_sentence: 善能除滅諸不善業。
translation: He's good at removing unwholesome actions.

source_sentence: 善說僧伽吒法門。
translation: He well explains the teaching of the saṃghâṭa dharma-gate.

source_sentence: 善哉，聞者！』
translation: Good, hearer!'

source_sentence: 爾時虛空中萬二千天子，至大仙所，合掌頂禮，白如是言：『大仙！
translation: At that point, 12,000 celestial beings in space came to the great sage, joined their palms and bowed their heads, and said, 'Great sage!

source_sentence: 憶念幾時事耶？』
translation: How many times do you remember these things?'

source_sentence: 復有四龍王、十八千億夜叉王，頭面禮敬白大仙言：『憶念幾時事耶？』
translation: Again, there were four dragon kings and 18 billion yakṣa kings who bowed their heads and faces to the great sage and said, 'Remember how many times did you do this?'

source_sentence: 大仙答言：『我憶念百千億阿僧祇劫。』
translation: The great sage answered, 'I remember a hundred thousand billion incalculably long eons.'

source_sentence: 問大仙言：『以何善根憶爾許事？』
translation: He asked the great sage, 'What good roots do you remember such things?'

source_sentence: 答言：『以曾聽受僧伽吒法門。
translation: He replied, 'I've heard and accepted the teaching of the saṃghâṭa school before.

source_sentence: 在彼眾中聞此法門發淨信者，皆得授阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: Those in the assembly who hear this teaching and give rise to pure faith will all be given the assurance of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 若人造作五逆之罪，聞此法門須臾之間，悉能除滅無量百千億劫，閉惡道門開生天道。
translation: If someone commits five heinous crimes and hears this teaching, they'll be able to remove them for measureless hundreds of thousands of millions of eons in an instant after hearing it, shutting off the gate of bad destinies and entering the heavenly path.

source_sentence: 於此法門聞四句偈功德如是，況復書寫、讀誦，供養華香、幡蓋，恭敬尊重，
translation: The merit of hearing the four-lined verse in this teaching is thus, how much more so when it’s written and recited, offered flowers, fragrances, banners, canopies, and shrouds with reverence and veneration.

source_sentence: 合掌禮拜一言讚善，如是功德不可思議。』」
translation: He joined his palms and praised it with one word of veneration, saying, Such merit is inconceivable.'

source_sentence: 爾時一切勇菩提薩埵白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that the all- valiant bodhisattva Sarvâstivāda said to the Buddha, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 云何合掌得功德等？
translation: How does he join his palms together to attain merit and so forth?

source_sentence: 誰讀此經一合掌禮？」
translation: Who reads this sūtra with one joined palm?

source_sentence: 佛告一切勇：「善男子！
translation: The Buddha told all the courageous, Good sons!

source_sentence: 若人造作五逆之罪，若教人作、若隨喜作，於此法門聞四句偈，合掌淨信能滅五逆。
translation: If someone commits five heinous crimes and teaches others to do them or follows the joy of doing them, they hear four-line verses in this teaching, joining their palms with pure faith that will extinguish the five heinous crimes.

source_sentence: 何況有人，於此法門具足書寫、讀誦、供養，如此功德多彼無量。
translation: How could there be a person who fully writes, recites, and makes offerings to this teaching with such merit that it's immeasurable?

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 譬如阿那婆達多池日光不照，從彼池中出五大河。
translation: It's like when the sun doesn't shine in Anavatapta Lake, and five great rivers emerge from that lake.

source_sentence: 一切勇！
translation: All the courageous ones!

source_sentence: 於意云何？
translation: What do you think?

source_sentence: 頗有人能數此五大河水渧數不？」
translation: Could anyone count the number of these five great rivers and streams of water?

source_sentence: 一切勇言：「不也。
translation: All the courageous ones said, No.

source_sentence: 世尊！」
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 佛告一切勇菩提薩埵：「善男子！
translation: The Buddha told all the courageous bodhisattvas, Good sons!

source_sentence: 聞此法門善根亦復如是，百千萬劫數不可盡。
translation: So it is with the good roots of hearing this teaching, which can't be exhausted for a hundred million eons.

source_sentence: 一切勇！
translation: All the courageous ones!

source_sentence: 於意云何？
translation: What do you think?

source_sentence: 須臾得聞如是法門，是難有不？」
translation: Is it difficult to hear such a teaching in a moment of time?

source_sentence: 一切勇言：「難有。
translation: All the bold men said, It's difficult to have.

source_sentence: 世尊！」
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 佛告一切勇：「於此法門能生信者復難於彼。
translation: The Buddha told Yiqie Yong, It's even more difficult for someone to give rise to faith in this teaching.

source_sentence: 譬如阿那婆達多池出五大河，如是五河水之渧數，數不可盡。」
translation: It's like the five great rivers that emerge from Anavatapta's pond, which are so numerous as to be inexhaustible.

source_sentence: 一切勇菩提薩埵摩訶薩埵白佛言：「世尊！
translation: All the courageous bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas of enlightenment all said to the Buddha, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 何等名為五大河也？」
translation: What are the five great rivers?

source_sentence: 佛告一切勇菩提薩埵：「五大河者，所謂：恒伽河、私陀河、博叉河、耶牟那河、月分河，
translation: The five great rivers are the Ganges River, the Sita River, the Taksa River, the Yamunā River, and the Yuezeng River.

source_sentence: 是五大河悉皆入海。
translation: These five great rivers all enter the ocean.

source_sentence: 此五大河，一河各有五百小河以為眷屬。
translation: These are the five great rivers, each of which has five hundred small rivers as their followers.

source_sentence: 一切勇！
translation: All the courageous ones!

source_sentence: 復有五大河在虛空中，一河各有一千小河以為眷屬。」
translation: Again, there are five large rivers in the sky, each of which has 1,000 small rivers as their retinues.

source_sentence: 一切勇菩提薩埵白佛言：「世尊！
translation: Vaiśravaṇa Bodhisattva said to the Buddha, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 何等是五河有千眷屬？」
translation: What are the five rivers with a thousand followers?

source_sentence: 佛告一切勇菩提薩埵：「第一河者名須陀羅，有千眷屬；
translation: The first river is called Sudarśana, with one thousand inhabitants.

source_sentence: 第二河者名曰羶佉，有千眷屬；
translation: The second river is called Nirmāṇarati, with one thousand inhabitants.

source_sentence: 第三河者名婆呵帝，有千眷屬；
translation: The third river is called Vāhatī, with one thousand inhabitants.

source_sentence: 第四河者名質多斯那，有千眷屬；
translation: The fourth river is named Citrusina and has one thousand inhabitants.

source_sentence: 第五河者名曰法蓋，有千眷屬。
translation: The fifth river is called Fazhi and has a thousand followers.

source_sentence: 一切勇！
translation: All the courageous ones!

source_sentence: 是名五大河有千眷屬。
translation: These are called the five great rivers with a thousand followers.

source_sentence: 一切勇！
translation: All the courageous ones!

source_sentence: 是五大河利益閻浮提，時時降雨增長華果，於閻浮提雨清淨水增長苗稼。
translation: These are the five great rivers that benefit Jambudvīpa, which rain down flowers and fruits from time to time and produce seedlings and crops when they rain pure water in Jambudvīpa.

source_sentence: 一切勇！
translation: All the courageous ones!

source_sentence: 如護世天安樂閻浮提波(提波渚也)。
translation: It's like the world-protecting heaven that brings peace and comfort to Jambudvīpa (also known as Deva island).

source_sentence: 此經亦爾，利益安樂閻浮提波，一切眾生如三十三天。」
translation: So is this sūtra, which benefits and comforts Jambudvīpa, and all sentient beings are like the Trāyastriṃśa gods.

source_sentence: 一切勇菩提薩埵白佛言：「世尊！
translation: Vaiśravaṇa Bodhisattva said to the Buddha, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 何等是三十三天？」
translation: What are the thirty-three gods?

source_sentence: 佛告一切勇菩提薩埵言：「釋迦提婆之所住處，是三十三天。
translation: The Buddha told all the courageous bodhisattvas, Śakra Devānām-Indra lives in the Trāyastriṃśa gods.

source_sentence: 一切勇！
translation: All the courageous ones!

source_sentence: 彼三十三天作如是語：『若有眾生口行善語者，彼人功德不可數知。
translation: The thirty-three gods said, 'If there are sentient beings who verbally practice good speech, their merit will be incalculable.

source_sentence: 若有眾生行口惡者，彼墮地獄、餓鬼、畜生不可數知。
translation: If there are sentient beings who do verbal evil, they'll fall into hell, hungry ghosts, and animals that can't be counted.

source_sentence: 眾生墮於地獄、畜生、餓鬼受大苦惱，時彼眾生無救護者，於三惡趣獨受劇苦。
translation: When sentient beings fall into hell, animals, or hungry ghosts and experience great suffering, those sentient beings lack protection and are alone in the three bad destinies to experience severe suffering.

source_sentence: 口行惡者是惡知識，口行善語是善知識，若見善知識則見如來，若見如來則滅一切不善之法。』
translation: Those who verbally practice bad are bad friends, and those who verbally practice good words are good friends; if they see good friends, they'll see the Tathāgata, and if they see the Tathāgata, they'll cease all unwholesome things.'

source_sentence: 一切勇！
translation: All the courageous ones!

source_sentence: 如護世天為閻浮提波而作利益。
translation: They're like the world-protecting gods who work for the benefit of Jambudvīpa.

source_sentence: 一切勇！
translation: All the courageous ones!

source_sentence: 此經亦如是，於閻浮提波而作佛事。
translation: This sūtra is likewise, performing buddha-works in Jambudvīpa.

source_sentence: 若不聞此法門者，不能至阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，不能轉法輪，不能擊法鼓，
translation: If someone doesn’t hear this teaching, they can’t attain unexcelled complete perfect enlightenment, turn the wheel of the Dharma, or beat the drum of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 不能坐於師子法座，不能入於涅槃之界，不能成就無邊光明。
translation: They can't sit on the lion's seat of the Dharma, enter the realm of nirvāṇa, or achieve limitless light.

source_sentence: 如是，如是！
translation: So it is, so it is!

source_sentence: 一切勇！
translation: All the courageous ones!

source_sentence: 不聞如是法門，不能坐於菩提樹下。」
translation: If someone doesn't hear such a teaching, they can't sit under the bodhi tree.

source_sentence: 時一切勇菩提薩埵摩訶薩埵白佛言：「世尊！
translation: All the courageous bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas then said to the Buddha, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我有少疑欲問世尊。」
translation: I have some doubts and want to ask the Bhagavān.

source_sentence: 佛告一切勇：「隨汝所問，當斷汝疑。」
translation: The Buddha told all the courageous ones, Follow what you ask, and you'll end your doubts.

source_sentence: 一切勇白佛言：「世尊！
translation: Yiqie Yong said to the Buddha, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 爾時仙人，度彼五逆人，令住不退地者，是何人也？」
translation: What kind of person was the sage at that time who liberated those five heinous people and made them stay in the ground of nonretrogression?

source_sentence: 佛告一切勇菩提薩埵：「善男子！
translation: The Buddha told all the courageous bodhisattvas, Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝今諦聽！
translation: Listen attentively now!

source_sentence: 如來所說微細難知，此僧伽吒法門，示仙人像。
translation: What the Tathāgata teaches is subtle and difficult to know, but this saṃghâṭa dharma-gate shows an image of the sage.

source_sentence: 如此法門能示佛身，如恒河中處處見沙，此法亦爾。
translation: Just as one sees sand everywhere in the Ganges River, so it is with this dharma-gate.

source_sentence: 自作示現為人說法，唯佛如來量與佛等。
translation: He himself shows that he teaches the Dharma for people, but only buddhas and tathāgatas are equal in size to buddhas.

source_sentence: 此法如是與佛平等，有此法處常有諸佛。」
translation: This teaching is thus equal to the Buddha, and where there's this teaching, there are always buddhas.

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊復告一切勇菩提薩埵：「善男子！
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān again addressed all the courageous bodhisattvas, Good sons!

source_sentence: 我念往昔九十九阿僧祇劫，爾時有佛號曰寶上如來；
translation: “For ninety-nine incalculably long eons of the past I remember that there was a buddha named Supreme Jewel Tathāgata at that time.

source_sentence: 次第有十二億佛，皆號寶上。
translation: In succession, there were twelve billion buddhas, all named Baosheng.

source_sentence: 我於爾時名曰淨月，行大布施。
translation: At the time, I was named Jīvaka and made a great offering.

source_sentence: 時十二億如來，我悉供養，以衣服、臥具、飲食、湯藥，香花、燈明、一切樂具，
translation: I offered clothing, bedding, food and drink, bathing water, incense, flowers, lamps, and all kinds of musical instruments to these twelve billion buddhas.

source_sentence: 悉以供養；
translation: They all made offerings to them.

source_sentence: 彼諸如來，不為我授阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: Those tathāgatas won't give me the assurance of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 一切勇！
translation: All the courageous ones!

source_sentence: 我念往昔，有十八億如來出興於世，皆號寶明。
translation: I remember that in the distant past eighteen billion buddhas emerged in the world, all called Jewel Light.

source_sentence: 我於爾時名曰龍正，行大布施，以香花、瓔珞供養彼佛；
translation: At that time I, named Nāgârjuna, made a great offering of incense, flowers, and jewelry to that buddha.

source_sentence: 彼諸如來，亦不授我阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: Neither did those tathāgatas give me the assurance of unsurpassed, correct enlightenment.

source_sentence: 一切勇！
translation: All the courageous ones!

source_sentence: 我念往昔，有二十億佛出興於世，皆號式棄如來、應供、正遍知。
translation: I'm mindful of the two billion buddhas that emerged in the world in the past, all called Śikhin Tathāgatas, Worthy of Offerings, and Perfectly Enlightened Ones.

source_sentence: 我於爾時行大布施，以諸樂具供養彼佛；
translation: At that time I made a great offering of all kinds of comforts to those buddhas.

source_sentence: 彼諸如來，亦不授我阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: Neither did those tathāgatas give me the assurance of unsurpassed, correct enlightenment.

source_sentence: 一切勇！
translation: All the courageous ones!

source_sentence: 我念往昔，有二十億諸佛出興於世，皆號迦葉。
translation: I remember that in the distant past twenty billion buddhas emerged in the world, all called Kāśyapa.

source_sentence: 我於爾時行大布施，以諸香華、幡蓋、衣服、一切樂具，供養彼佛；
translation: At that time I made a great offering of incense, flowers, pennants, canopies, clothes, and all kinds of musical instruments to that buddha.

source_sentence: 彼諸如來，亦不授我阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: Neither did those tathāgatas give me the assurance of unsurpassed, correct enlightenment.

source_sentence: 一切勇！
translation: All the courageous ones!

source_sentence: 我念往昔，有十六億諸佛如來出興於世，皆號淨光。
translation: I remember that in the past sixteen hundred million buddha-tathāgatas emerged in the world, all called Pure Light.

source_sentence: 我於爾時作大長者子，行大布施捨一切物。
translation: At the time, I was the great elderly man's son, making a great gift of all things.

source_sentence: 彼十六億諸佛如來，我悉供養以香花、幡蓋、衣服、臥具、食飲、湯藥；
translation: Those sixteen billion buddha-tathāgatas I propitiated with fragrant flowers, banners and canopies, clothes, bedding, food and drink, and medicine.

source_sentence: 亦不授我阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: They won't give me the assurance of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 一切勇！
translation: All the courageous ones!

source_sentence: 我念往昔，九十五億諸佛如來出興於世，皆號釋迦牟尼應供、正遍知。

translation: At the end, the Tathāgata Vibhāṣika taught this teaching, and after the sentient beings in Jambudvīpa heard it, seven treasures rained down from the sky.

source_sentence: 爾時，閻浮提眾生悉無貧窮，我於爾時，亦不得授阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: At the time, all the sentient beings in Jambudvīpa were not poor, and at the time, I couldn't give assurance of unsurpassed, correct enlightenment.

source_sentence: 但聞空聲而告我言：『汝不久當得受阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。』」
translation: He simply heard the sound of emptiness and told me, 'Soon, you will receive the assurance of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.'

translation: How long did it take to give the assurance of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment?

translation: After 9,200,000,000 incalculably long eons, a Buddha emerged in the world, named Randana Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Enlightened One.

source_sentence: 我於爾時作摩那婆子，名曰彌伽(彌伽者魏言雲)，於然燈佛所作摩那婆，

source_sentence: 修清淨行。
translation: He cultivates pure practices.

source_sentence: 我見彼佛，以七莖青蓮花，供養然燈如來。

source_sentence: 以此善根，迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: With these good roots, he dedicates himself back to unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 爾時，然燈如來即授我記：『摩那婆！
translation: At that point, however, the Tathāgata of Lamplight then gave me this assurance, 'Manabhadra!

translation: In the future, after an incalculably long eon, he'll become a buddha named Śākyamuni Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Enlightened One.'

source_sentence: 一切勇！
translation: All the courageous ones!

source_sentence: 我於爾時聞授記聲，踊身虛空高十二多羅，住虛空中得無生法忍。
translation: At the time, when I heard the sound of my prediction, I jumped up into space twelve taels high and stayed in space to attain the tolerance of the nonarising of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 無量阿僧祇劫所修淨行，與六波羅蜜相應，一切善根悉皆現前，如視掌中菴摩羅果。
translation: The pure practice cultivated over immeasurable incalculable eons is associated with the six perfections, and all good roots are manifested like the fruit of ambrosia in the palm of your hand.

source_sentence: 一切勇！
translation: All the courageous ones!

source_sentence: 我於爾時，令無量百千億眾生住於善法。
translation: At the time, I caused measureless hundreds of thousands of millions of sentient beings to abide in the good Dharma.

source_sentence: 一切勇！
translation: All the courageous ones!

source_sentence: 況今我成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，利益眾生。
translation: How could it be that now I've achieved unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment to benefit sentient beings?

source_sentence: 我觀眾生以何應度，隨其方便為其說法：若為諸天，現作天身而為說法；
translation: To what should I save the sentient beings in my assembly? Teaching them appropriately according to their capacities. If I were to teach the Dharma for the sake of the gods, I would now become a heavenly form and expound the truth.

source_sentence: 若在龍宮，示作龍身而為說法；
translation: If he were in the palace of a dragon, he taught the Dharma by portraying himself as a dragon.

source_sentence: 於夜叉中，示夜叉身而為說法；
translation: Among the yakṣas, they show their bodies and teach the Dharma to them.

source_sentence: 於餓鬼中，作餓鬼身而為說法；
translation: In the midst of hungry ghosts he taught the Dharma in the form of a hungry ghost.

source_sentence: 若為人道，示作人身而為說法；
translation: If you teach the Dharma for the sake of others, show yourself to be a human being and expound the Teaching.

source_sentence: 應以佛身而受化者，示作佛身而為說法；
translation: To those who are to be taught in the form of buddha they teach by showing them the form of buddhahood.

translation: Those who should be taught with the bodhisattva body and show that the bodhisattva body teaches the Dharma to them.

source_sentence: 我觀眾生以何應度，如是如是，為眾生現隨應說法。
translation: To what should I save the sentient beings in my audience? Thus and so forth, I teach the Dharma to sentient beings as appropriate in the present.

source_sentence: 一切勇！
translation: All the courageous ones!

source_sentence: 我為眾生演說諸法有多方便。
translation: I'll explain the teachings for sentient beings with many skillful means.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is it so?

source_sentence: 一切勇！
translation: All the courageous ones!

source_sentence: 具足善根眾生得聞此法，一切善根悉得增長。
translation: When sentient beings with good roots hear this teaching, all good roots will grow.

source_sentence: 慳者布施，無福德者修行福德，自利利他修於念死，彼聞法故作此善根，
translation: Those who are stingy give generosity, those without virtue cultivate virtue, and those who benefit themselves and others cultivate mindfulness of death. Because they hear the Dharma, they make this root of goodness.

source_sentence: 以聽法故過去善根亦得增明，彼得長夜利益安樂一切天人。
translation: Because they listened to the teaching, their good roots from the past also became increasingly bright, and for a long time they benefited and comforted all gods and humans.

source_sentence: 一切勇！
translation: All the courageous ones!

translation: At that point, the sentient beings each said to themselves, 'Is there any other good practice that will attain unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment?'

source_sentence: 善眾生言：『有法布施修行，口說善語，如是等法得善果報至無上道。』
translation: Good sentient beings say, 'There's a teaching that gives alms and cultivates practice, speaks good words in words, and such things attain the results of goodness up to the unsurpassed path.'

source_sentence: 愚癡之人作如是言：『無法無施，無善惡果，無口善報。』
translation: A foolish man says, 'There's no dharma without generosity, no good or bad results, and no verbal or wholesome rewards.'

translation: That foolish man will attain the great retribution of sin and fall into a bad destiny in turn.

source_sentence: 十二劫墮餓鬼中受餓鬼苦，萬四千劫生處瘖瘂，萬六千劫母胎腸墮，萬二千劫生作肉摶，
translation: For twelve eons he fell into the realm of hungry ghosts and suffered the torments of hungry ghosts. source_sentence: 萬一千劫生處目盲。
translation: For 1,000,000 eons, they'll be born blind in their eyes.

translation: They won't attain the power of repaying their son's kindness.'

source_sentence: 一切勇！

source_sentence: 從天命終生欝單曰，不入母胎目見百千世界，悉名安樂，見一切國土諸佛，
translation: At the end of his life in heaven he was born in Uttarakuru. Without entering his mother’s womb, he saw with his own eyes a hundred thousand worlds called Anāthapiṇḍika and all the buddhas of all the lands therein.

translation: May the Bhagavān explain why he's smiling now?'

translation: It's for gods, dragons, yakṣas, humans, and non-humans.'

translation: Again, there were another eighty-four thousand brahmans and nine thousand billion Nirgranthas who came to discuss the matter.

source_sentence: 我悉降伏諸婆羅門為其說法，皆發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
translation: I subdued all the Brāhmaṇas and taught them the Dharma, and they all aroused the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 九千億尼揵陀，皆得須驢多波帝(魏言逆流)。
translation: Nine thousand koṭis of nirvāṇas were all given to Śubhavyūha (known as Upapadya in the Wei language).

source_sentence: 萬八千億龍王悉來集會，聞我說法悉發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
translation: Ten thousand and eight hundred myriads of koṭis of nāga kings all came to the assembly, and when they heard me teach the Dharma, they all aroused the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 六萬億淨居天子亦來集會，復有三萬億惡魔及其眷屬亦來集會，有萬二千阿修羅王悉來集會，
translation: Sixty-thousand myriads of koṭis of celestial beings also came to the assembly. Three hundred myriads of koṭis of evil Māras and their retinues also came to the assembly, and twelve thousand asura kings all came to the assembly.

source_sentence: 五百大王及諸眷屬悉來集會聽我說法。
translation: The five hundred great kings and their retinues all came to this assembly to hear me teach the Dharma.

source_sentence: 既聞法已，皆發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。』
translation: After hearing the teaching, they all give rise to the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.'

translation: It was then that Maitreya Bodhisattva rose from his seat, bowed his head at the Buddha's feet, circumambulated him three times to his right, and disappeared without appearing.

translation: At that moment, the bodhisattva Samantabhadra Bodhisattva Mahāsattva rose from his seat, bared his right shoulder, knelt with his right knee on the ground and joined his palms to the Buddha.

source_sentence: 白佛言：「世尊！

source_sentence: 二、名善歡喜王；

source_sentence: 三、名憂波難陀王；

source_sentence: 四、名勝踊王；

source_sentence: 五、名梵將軍王；

source_sentence: 六、名梵響王；

source_sentence: 七、名善見王；

source_sentence: 八、名善歡喜王；

translation: Those bodhisattvas all stayed at the tenth ground, went to the great city of Rājagṛha and arrived at the Tathāgata's place, and attained unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment without regressing.

source_sentence: 時一切勇菩提薩埵到十方國，告諸菩提薩埵言曰：「今日如來於王舍城演說大法，

translation: Now, you should praise it as good, so that you'll always attain peace and benefit.

source_sentence: 爾時，一切勇菩提薩埵，到十方國供養諸佛，告諸菩提薩埵，言已還歸此土。
translation: At the time, the bodhisattva All Courageous Bodhisattva went to the countries in the ten directions to make offerings to the buddhas, told the bodhisattvas, and returned to this land after saying so.

source_sentence: 譬如壯士屈申臂頃，至王舍城住如來前。
translation: It's like when a strong man bends his arm and goes to the city of Rājagṛha and stands in front of the Tathāgata.

source_sentence: 時一切婆羅門、諸外道悉已集會，天、龍、夜叉、阿修羅、人、非人等皆悉集會，
translation: All the brahmans and heretics had already assembled. Gods, dragons, yakṣas, titans, asuras, humans, and nonhumans were also assembled.

source_sentence: 五百大王及其眷屬亦來集會，三萬億惡魔及諸眷屬亦來集會。
translation: The five hundred great kings and their retinues also came to the assembly, and 3,000 billion bad demons and their retinues also came to the assembly.

source_sentence: 爾時，王舍城地大震動，時十方諸佛世界，雨栴檀末香雨天妙華，雨如來上成大華臺，
translation: At that time the earth of the city of Rājagṛha shook greatly. Then the buddha worlds in the ten directions rained sandalwood powder and heavenly flowers, and rained down upon the enlightened ones to form a great flower-seat.

source_sentence: 金剛力士執金剛杵在如來前。
translation: Vajrapāṇi's strong man held the vajra in front of the Tathāgata.

source_sentence: 爾時，四方有四風王，入王舍城悉吹城內糞穢土沙遠置城外。
translation: At the time, there were four wind kings in the four directions who entered Rājagṛha and blew into the city of Rājagṛha, blowing dust and dirty dirt inside the city and placing it far away outside the city.

source_sentence: 爾時，十方世界雨眾香水，十方世界雨優鉢羅華、拘物頭華、分陀利華，
translation: At that time, the worlds in the ten directions rained down many kinds of fragrant water. The worlds in the ten directions rained blue lotus blossoms, red lotus blossoms, and white lotus blossoms.

source_sentence: 在虛空中化成華蓋。

translation: In space there were eighty-four thousand million lion seats made of the seven kinds of treasure, and all those seats had buddhas teaching the wonderful Dharma.

source_sentence: 爾時，三千世界六種震動。
translation: At the time, 3,000 worlds and six kinds of earthquakes shook.

translation: Suppose there's a person who goes to the king's gate and enters straight in from his own height when he reaches the king's gate, and then the gatekeeper seizes and binds him.

source_sentence: 王聞有人直入王門，王作是念：『此人直入必欲相害。』
translation: The king heard that someone had entered the king's gate directly, and the king thought, 'That person who enters directly will surely want to harm each other.'

source_sentence: 時王瞋恚勅諸臣言：『汝將此人斷其命根，并其父母、兄弟、姊妹。』
translation: The king then angrily commanded his ministers, saying, 'Take this man to cut off his life root and his parents, brothers, and sisters.'

source_sentence: 其人眷屬皆悉憂愁悲泣啼哭。
translation: The members of his retinue were all grieved, weeping and wailing.

source_sentence: 如來說法亦復如是，吾我自高喻諸凡夫，得見佛身耳聞說法，自生高慢說種種語，
translation: The Tathāgata teaches the Dharma in much the same way: I am a self-exalted metaphor for worldlings who see the Buddha’s body, hear his teaching through their ears, and become conceited of themselves.

source_sentence: 住吾我地自不聽受亦不說法。
translation: They themselves don't hear, accept, or teach the Dharma when they live in our land.

source_sentence: 若人說法一偈一喻亦不聽受，作如是言：『如此之法我已先知。』
translation: If someone teaches a single verse or a single metaphor and doesn't listen to it, they say, 'Such is the teaching I've known before.'

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is it so?

source_sentence: 住我慢地，或恃多聞自從放逸，與愚癡人共住不聞正法，自以多聞放逸不如法說，
translation: They may abide in the stage of self-conceit, relying on well-versed and heedlessness, or they may live together with foolish people who don't hear the right teaching because they themselves are well-versed and heedless and teach incorrectly.

source_sentence: 自作手筆而自說之。
translation: He made his own hand writing brush and explained it to himself.

source_sentence: 一切世人欺誑自身，作如是言：『有財施我，我是福田。』
translation: All the people in the world deceive themselves and say, 'If you give me money, this is a field of merit.'

source_sentence: 彼愚癡人自誑其身，亦誑世間，食他信施不能消故，命欲終時生大恐怖。
translation: That foolish man pitys himself for his body and pitys the world, because he eats others' faithful gifts that can't be digested, and great fear arises when his life is about to end.

source_sentence: 諸人告言：『汝足伎術，何不自救？』
translation: The people told him, 'Why don't you save yourself if you have the skillful means to do so?'

source_sentence: 答言：『今日伎術不能自救憂悲苦惱。』
translation: He replied, 'Today's trick can't save itself from sorrow and suffering.'

source_sentence: 眾人語言：『為一人故，父母、兄弟、親里、眷屬，無事誅戮。』
translation: The people said, 'For the sake of one person, there's nothing to kill for their parents, brothers, relatives, and retinues.'

translation: Sentient beings thus approach bad friends and fall into hell, animals, or hungry ghosts.

translation: What you practice is not the ultimate path, and it's ultimately destroyed.

translation: In the future, there won't be small sentient beings or old sentient beings who create birth and cessation.

source_sentence: 我等詣佛聽此法門，願我等輩皆得如來妙色之身形色像貌，願如如來、應、正遍知。」
translation: We go to the Buddha and hear this teaching, wishing that all of us will attain the Tathāgata's marvelously colored body, form, and appearance, and wishing that the Tathāgata, Arhat, and Perfectly Enlightened One will know it.

source_sentence: 汝等來詣佛所聽此法門，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，汝等不久當得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。」
translation: Come to the Buddha and listen to this teaching, give rise to the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment, and you will soon attain unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 爾時如來說此語已，諸外道尼乾子等，皆得無生法忍住於十地。
translation: After the Tathāgata spoke these words, the non-Buddhist Nirgranthas and others attained the forbearance of the nonarising of the Dharma and stayed in the tenth ground.

source_sentence: 時諸菩提薩埵以自神通，踊在空中高七多羅，於虛空中化成七寶臺奉施如來，
translation: With their own supernatural powers, the bodhisattvas and enlightening beings then flew up into the sky seven-thousand yojanas high, transforming themselves into seven-jeweled terraces in space to offer them to the Buddha.

source_sentence: 在於虛空中作種種神通而自變化。
translation: In space, he creates various miraculous powers and transforms himself.

source_sentence: 爾時諸天，於虛空中當如來上，雨眾妙花念佛如來，於其自身起佛身想。
translation: It was then that the gods rained down a multitude of marvelous flowers in the sky above the Tathāgata and thought of the Buddha as the Tathāgata, and they gave rise to the idea of the Buddha's body on their own.

source_sentence: 無量百千諸天子，以華散佛作如是言：「得大利益，沙門瞿曇真是世間大良福田，
translation: Measureless hundreds of thousands of celestial beings scattered flowers over the Buddha and said to him, “O great benefactor! The renunciant Gotama is indeed a great field of blessings in this world.

source_sentence: 具足三昧自在之力，如是等眾生漸具方便，說一善語得離生死。」
translation: They are endowed with the power of the mastery of samādhi, and such sentient beings gradually equip themselves with skillful means to speak a single good word that will free them from birth and death.

source_sentence: 爾時藥上菩提薩埵摩訶薩埵從座而起，偏袒右肩右膝著地，合掌白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that the Bhaiṣajyasamudgata Bodhisattva Mahāsattva rose from his seat, bared his right shoulder, knelt with his right knee on the ground, joined his palms and said to the Buddha, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 此諸天子，何因緣故作如是語，現諸神通善讚如來？」
translation: What is the reason these celestial beings say such words and show their supernormal powers to praise the Tathāgata?

source_sentence: 佛告藥上菩提薩埵言：「善男子！

translation: Those bodhisattvas did not praise me, but they praised their own bodies. They sat on the throne of the king of the Dharma with their own bodies and sat on the seat of the Dharma with their own bodies.

source_sentence: 以其自身放法光明，諸佛所護，於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提正覺說法。」
translation: By emanating the light of the Dharma from their own body, they are protected by the buddhas and teach the Dharma to the unsurpassed, correctly awakened bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 爾時藥上菩提薩埵摩訶薩埵白佛言：「世尊！
